algorithm_technique: Iterate through the string, tracking consecutive identical characters and checking conditions.
problem_summary_simple: Check if a string has a substring of length k with identical characters, bordered by different characters.
problem_summary_technical: Scans the string to identify runs of identical characters, checking length and boundary conditions for a special substring of length k.
key_insights: A single pass through the string is sufficient.
Maintain a counter for consecutive identical characters.
Edge cases for the start and end of the string need careful handling.
